name: CKRecord.Reference
desc: A relationship between two records in a record zone.

items.name: init(recordID: CKRecord.ID, action: CKRecord.ReferenceAction)
items.desc: Creates a reference object that points to the record with the specified ID.

items.name: init(record: CKRecord, action: CKRecord.ReferenceAction)
items.desc: Creates a reference object that points to the specified record object.

items.name: var action: CKRecord.ReferenceAction
items.desc: The ownership behavior for the records.

items.name: var recordID: CKRecord.ID
items.desc: The ID of the referenced record.

items.name: enum CKRecord.ReferenceAction
items.desc: Constants that indicate the behavior when deleting a referenced record.
